long_description: Suit up your young snow rider in the boys' 686 Dickies Industrial insulated jacket and let him show off some rugged working-man style while he shreds pow in warm, waterproof and breathable comfort. Durable polyester fabric features INFIDRY-10(TM) waterproof breathable coating and taped critical seams for reliable protection from wind and water. Light insulation in the body, sleeves and hood helps ensure warmth without bulk and continues to insulate when wet. Smooth lining easily slides over base layers. Youth Evolution sleeves extend 1.5 in. to keep up with child's growth for another season. Full-length, 2-way front zipper is covered by a stormflap with faux logo snaps. Adjustable hood; flap-top hand pockets; adjustable powder skirt; rip-and-stick cuffs.
short_description: Suit up your young snow rider in the boys' 686 Dickies Industrial insulated jacket and let him show off some rugged working-man style while he shreds pow in warm, waterproof and breathable comfort.
